article.title: Trident to Build Computer Communications Network
article.text:
Trident Technologies LLC,* Huntsville, Alabama, was awarded a $48 million firm-fixed-price contract for building, staffing and maintaining the computer communications network to support the research and development activities of the Engineer Research and Development Center. Bids were solicited via the Internet, with three received. Work locations and funding will be determined with each order, with an estimated completion date of FebruaryÂ 28, 2022. U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Vicksburg, Mississippi, is the contracting activity (W912HZ-17-D-0004).
* Small Business
